caption.p: US mechanochemistry releases camptothecin (CPT) herbal monoterpene. (a) Fluorescent micrograph of Nothapodytes nimmoniana stem sample showing autofluorescence of CPT in the epidermal layer. (b) The US mechanochemical cleavage of polymers disulfide bond that releases CPT from its Î²-carbonate linker presented in 2D and 3D structures (License Number: 5022331159441) [ [71], [72]].
